option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!--TODO : Change Title Color--> <!--Base file for Drawer--> <group android:checkableBehavior="single">
<item android:id="@+id/nav_home" android:icon="@drawable/home_icon" android:title="Home" />
<item android:id="@+id/nav_exp_map" android:icon="@drawable/map_drop_pin_icon" android:title="Explore On Map" />

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!--TODO : Change Title Color--> <!--Base file for Drawer--> <group android:checkableBehavior="single">
<item android:id="@+id/nav_home" android:icon="@drawable/home_icon" android:title="Home" />
<item android:id="@+id/nav_exp_map" android:icon="@drawable/map_drop_pin_icon" android:title="Explore On Map" />
<item android:id="@+id/nav_add_location" android:icon="@drawable/ic_add_location" android:title="Add Location" />
<item android:id="@+id/nav_favorit" android:icon="@drawable/fav_icon" android:title="My Favorites" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_about_us" android:icon="@drawable/two_person_icon" android:title="About Us" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_settings" android:icon="@drawable/settings" android:title="Settings" /> </group>
<item android:title="Profile">
<menu> <group android:checkableBehavior="single">
<item android:id="@+id/nav_profile" android:icon="@drawable/fringerprint_icon" android:title="Profile" />
<item android:id="@+id/nav_log_out" android:icon="@drawable/log_out_icon" android:title="Log Out" />
</group> </menu> </item>
</menu>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<!-- Base application theme with consistent color scheme --> <style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/GoldSand</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/Tanbrown</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/white</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Theme --> <style name="ToolbarTheme" parent="ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Primary"> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Theme --> <style name="ToolbarTheme" parent="ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Primary"> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>

<item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style> <!-- Toolbar Theme --> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item parent="ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Primary"> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <!-- Toolbar Theme --> <style name="ToolbarTheme" parent="ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Primary"> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style> <style name="ToolbarTheme" parent="ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Primary"> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style> <!-- Primary Button Style --> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">60dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="cornerRadius">30dp</item> </style>
<item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <style name="SecondaryButton" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item>
<!-- Primary Text Style --> <style name="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textAlignment">center</item>
<!-- Title Text Style --> <style name="TitleText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Heading Text Style --> <style name="HeadingText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Body Text Style --> <style name="BodyText" parent="PrimaryText"> </style>
<!-- Custom EditText Style --> <style name="CustomEditText"> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:drawablePadding">8dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:minHeight">48dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <item name="android:paddingEnd">20dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">8dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">8dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">20dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item>
<!-- Card Style (main Card Style for all boxes)--> <style name="AppCard" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.CardView"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/white</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">30dp</item> </style>
<!-- Styles for About Us Page --> <style name="AboutPage.TextView.Base" parent="Widget.AppCompat.TextView"> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">50dp</item> <item name="android:textAlignment">center</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Title" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Mission" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Paragraph" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textStyle">italic</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.Button.Link" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">40dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">40dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginTop">0dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/Blue2</item> <item name="android:textSize">12sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Title Appearance Style --> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:gravity">center_vertical</item> </style>
</resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources>
<!-- Base application theme with consistent color scheme --> <style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/GoldSand</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/Tanbrown</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/white</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<!-- Primary Button Style --> <style name="PrimaryButton" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">60dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textSize">18sp</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="cornerRadius">30dp</item> </style>
<!-- Secondary Button Style --> <style name="SecondaryButton" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> </style>
<!-- Primary Text Style --> <style name="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textAlignment">center</item> </style>
<!-- Title Text Style --> <style name="TitleText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">36sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Heading Text Style --> <style name="HeadingText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Body Text Style --> <style name="BodyText" parent="PrimaryText"> <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> </style>
<!-- Custom EditText Style --> <style name="CustomEditText"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:background">@drawable/custom_edittext</item> <item name="android:drawablePadding">8dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:minHeight">48dp</item> <item name="android:paddingStart">20dp</item> <item name="android:paddingEnd">20dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">8dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">8dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">20dp</item> </style>
<!-- Card Style (main Card Style for all boxes)--> <style name="AppCard" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.CardView"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/white</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">30dp</item> <item name="cardElevation">20dp</item> <item name="android:layout_margin">30dp</item> </style>
<!-- Styles for About Us Page --> <style name="AboutPage.TextView.Base" parent="Widget.AppCompat.TextView"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">50dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">50dp</item> <item name="android:textAlignment">center</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Title" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">40dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Mission" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">10dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.TextView.Paragraph" parent="AboutPage.TextView.Base"> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">italic</item> <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">40dp</item> </style>
<style name="AboutPage.Button.Link" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item> <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item> <item name="android:layout_marginStart">40dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginEnd">40dp</item> <item name="android:layout_marginTop">0dp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="android:textSize">12sp</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Title Appearance Style --> <style name="ToolbarTitleAppearance" parent="TextAppearance.Widget.AppCompat.Toolbar.Title"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> <item name="android:gravity">center_vertical</item> <item name="android:layout_gravity">center_vertical</item> </style>
</resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Base.Theme.HiddenSriLanka" parent="Theme.Material3.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Apply your consistent color scheme --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/DeepForestGreen</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/GoldYellow</item> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/GoldSand</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/Tanbrown</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/white</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/NavyBlue</item> </style>
<style name="Theme.HiddenSriLanka" parent="Base.Theme.HiddenSriLanka" />
<!-- Toolbar Theme - Fixed duplicate issue --> <style name="ToolbarTheme" parent="ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Primary"> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/NavyBlue</item> <item name="titleTextAppearance">@style/ToolbarTitleAppearance</item> </style>
</resources>
